# Heart Disease Prediction Web App - Copilot Instructions

This project is a comprehensive heart disease prediction system using multiple machine learning models with SHAP analysis for interpretability.

## Project Overview
- **Goal**: Build the most accurate heart disease prediction model possible
- **Technology Stack**: Python, scikit-learn, XGBoost, SHAP, Jupyter notebooks
- **Models**: Random Forest, XGBoost, SVM, Neural Networks, Ensemble methods
- **Focus**: Maximum accuracy, model interpretability, comprehensive evaluation

## Development Guidelines
- Prioritize model accuracy and performance
- Implement multiple ML algorithms for comparison
- Include SHAP for feature importance and model interpretability
- Use proper data preprocessing and feature engineering
- Implement comprehensive model evaluation metrics
- Create clear visualizations for model performance

## File Structure
```
/
├── .github/
├── models/          # ML model implementations
├── data/           # Dataset and preprocessing
├── notebooks/      # Jupyter notebooks for exploration
├── requirements.txt
└── README.md
```
